content.prompt: Which of the following sequences of activities does the writer favor?

choices.label: A train trip, a tour of Xining, an airplane flight
An airplane flight, a train trip, a tour of Xining
An airplane flight, a tour of Xining, a train trip
A tour of Xining, a train trip, an airplane flight

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
